items.name: case fill
items.desc: Render the area contained within the path using the non-zero winding number rule.

items.name: case eoFill
items.desc: Render the area within the path using the even-odd rule.

items.name: case stroke
items.desc: Render a line along the path.

items.name: case fillStroke
items.desc: First fill and then stroke the path, using the nonzero winding number rule.

items.name: case eoFillStroke
items.desc: First fill and then stroke the path, using the even-odd rule.
